TRANSACTION_WITH_INVALID_USER_ID: Invalid request, the user issuing this transaction does not exist on this platform.
FAILED_DB_PERSIST: Failed to save the record to the database.
UNKNOWN_EXCEPTION: Sorry, an error occured, kinldy notify support staff for immediate assistance.
FAILED_TO_RETRIEVE_RECORD: Failed to reteive any record with the provided ID, please provide a valid ID.
